title:
On the boundedness of Gross' solution to the planar Skorokhod embedding
  problem
authors: Maher Boudabra, Dhaker Kroumi, Boubaker Smii
abstract:
In this work, we investigate the problem of the boundedness of the Gross'
solutions of the planar Skorokhod embedding problem, where we show that the
solution is bounded under some mild conditions on the underlying probability
distribution.
